description.p: Given an existing MTC Task object and a target grasp pose, appends MTC stages to describe a motion plan to approach, grasp, and lift an object at that pose.

Action.input_port: Target grasp pose for the end effector.
Name of the planning group for the arm.
Name of the planning group for the hand.
Name of the end effector in the SRDF file.
Name of the end effector frame.
Name of the named state corresponding to the closed end effector joint values.
Distance (in meters) to approach an object from before grabbing it.
Distance (in meters) to lift an object after grabbing it.
